pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June, there was a celebration with about 300 people in Babelsberg Park, and a week later, about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona regulation, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited by the park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has long complained that visitors are leaving more and more rubbish behind and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln, 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on Sunday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was disbanded by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after corona outbreak
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist town of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: Many of those infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holidaymaker has also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.7: The curfew was set at 11 p.m.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations here and there" of bookings, said the head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, Hans Wieser, to the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: Occasional guests had also left early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist destination in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections became public knowledge on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended on Saturday the behaviour of the interns, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have become infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing that in our youth," he told radio station 1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The tourism board launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees about the dangers of COVID-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak brings back memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a centre of corona spread throughout Europe in the early stages of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: Overall, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The main areas of new infections are Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - The English football record champions Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year's absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the Premier League with a 2-0 (0-0) win over direct rivals Leicester City on the final day of the Premier League.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to content themselves with the Europa League, because Chelsea FC passed by and qualified for the premier class in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa could cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead through a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in added time, Jesse Lingard (90th + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, FC Bayern's opponent in the Champions League round of 16, won 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4).
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's win over Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who moved past Wolves with a meager 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace to start sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford FC and AFC Bournemouth, but had to shiver for a long time at West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84th) immediately equalized Andrey Yarmolenko (85th).
wn.de.700458.13: But the 1: 1 (0: 0) was enough, because Watford lost 2: 3 (1: 3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which sacked three coaches during the season, is relegated after five premier league years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which could not save itself by a 3: 1 (2: 1) at FC Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool FC, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points in the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th) turned the game on Sunday for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It has been an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," goal scorer van Dijk said after the game, "that should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses should also be happy in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Football operations in England were suspended from 13 March to 17 June due to the coronavirus crisis.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about prematurely stopping or holding the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played to the end without any special incidents - however, as in Germany, without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Prime Minister Netanyahu are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police took violent action against participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people have been arrested for participating in riots, said police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also arrested, the news website "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the prime minister's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: A man has been arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray on roadside demonstrators from a moving car, according to police.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: In Jerusalem and Tel Aviv there have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of premature relaxation and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new coronavirus infections in Israel recently rose to record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Transporter crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhr area - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen caused nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A driver was driving with her two children (3, 5) towards Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "She probably braked suddenly because she wanted to turn.".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after suspected corona case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to ward off the coronavirus as a "shining success.".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: The country is now reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official case of suspected corona in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership declared the highest level of alert.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea said it had not registered a single infection and described its defenses as a "shining success.".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: Symptoms of the disease were reportedly detected in a "runaway" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person defected to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: Initially, there was no confirmation from South Korea of the border crossing within the four-kilometer-wide and largely still-mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: South Korea's military, however, acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: Investigations were underway on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea said it called an emergency meeting of the Labor Party's Politburo, chaired by leader Kim Jong Un, on Saturday over the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster.".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: As a preventive measure, Kim had already ordered on Friday to "completely blockade Kaesong and isolate every district and the region from others," it added.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all people in Kaesong who had contact with her were quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The party's central military commission is to investigate the "runaway case" as well as the conduct of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: An estimated 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of council meeting: City-East and noise protection to be discussed before big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the major city centre development east project," reads rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, 28 July, at 4.30 p.m. in the Great Hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, the revaluation of the eastern city is controversial until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are narrow, most recently in individual committees, depending on their attendance, even negative.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project, developed by the citizens and then by the administration and the municipal council, now fail after almost ten years of preparation, criticized project opponent Reinhard Klein as "extra-parliamentary opposition," "clueless," "speculation," "denigration" and "deliberate false statements.".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the contracts, he is in this position: "I know what I am talking about.".
pz-news.de.72354.8: Contrary to statements by the city administration, the Technical Town Hall is to be redeveloped for 8.5 million euros after subsidies, of which Klein is convinced that it exists.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than predicted by the town hall and by the supporters from the business community.
pz-news.de.72354.10: Shaping the city by his own efforts and not by an investor: This is his plan B. One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: Essentially, it also provides for the redevelopment of the Technical Town Hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting the Ex-Thale for administrative space and a smaller-scale redesign of the city centre, ideally with local authorities.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: Environmental issues will also play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from noise pollution caused by road traffic, including speed reductions in many cases.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local transport club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this has to happen, because they have contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting the regular bus service with thinned out clocks and by little commitment to bicycle traffic, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the city's participation in the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes the accession to the Climate Protection Pact of the State of Baden-Württemberg, the reassessment of parental contributions in the municipal day care centers and the application for admission to the federal smart city funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with much delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of supercars can start regular operation, the first test drives were now due.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from taking his first business trip in the new Lamborghini Huracan of Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to go into corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun. ".
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite his only 25 years, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT racing and was able to help his new team-mate in many ways.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring.".
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 supercars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: But Zimmermann, who is one of 15 series newcomers, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015, he was a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track," says Zimmermann, who is competing for the Friedrichshafen-based racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally in order to be fast.".
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is will be revealed in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play a bit of poker in the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "Ultimately, however, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring.".
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current situation is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a celebrity guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take the GT wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British transport minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine conditions is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new rule will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the scheme will only apply to those who are just on holiday from Saturday, August 1, and has not been introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Spain is still considered one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine is required in Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers must have known in advance that there was a possibility of a quarantine being imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to tell Grant Shapps.".
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the corona emergency in Spain and the expiry of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists blame nightlife in particular for the recent spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of Britain's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government currently advises against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, with the exception of the Canary and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that his country's warships will be equipped with the latest hypersonic weapons on the occasion of Navy Day.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, which are unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces would be extended, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to the Interfax agency, the Ministry of Defense also informed about successful tests of the Zircon hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 metres per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will also continue on the atomically equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also sailed a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual naval units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has reliably protected Russia, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Naval forces also celebrated Navy Day with parades in many other Russian coastal towns.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defense showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also attack helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help hampered by Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening flooding, strong winds and heavy rains are now threatening parts of the US state, announced the National Hurricane Center of the US climate agency NOAA in the night to Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The corona pandemic raging in Texas is complicating the work of aid workers, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a huge challenge," Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the hurricane in Texas, he added, "This challenge is complicated and compounded by the fact that it is sweeping through what is the most COVID-19-affected area of the state.".
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died as a result of the corona pandemic in Texas alone.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to exercise caution.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "that we have become accustomed to," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have been provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, Corona should be tested in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" hit the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: A storm surge warning was initially issued for the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent and was later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown as "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, hurricane "Douglas" was on its way towards Hawaii during the night to Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: The hurricane center, however, expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it should be near the largest islands of Hawaii on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: Over the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average active hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the authority had said.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into major storms.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperatures in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, the probability of a below-average season is only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote via Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video assistant "punishes" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic was denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals disallowed: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at the 0: 2 (0: 1) at SSC Napoli in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: The VAR has never been so hard on a team, "commented the" Corriere dello Sport. ".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Napoli had taken the lead through a goal from full-back Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, while Filip Djuricic cheered the equaliser in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the hit because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - the VAR intervened again.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also withdrawn by the referee team after a tip-off from the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time, Allan made the 2-0 final score for Napoli and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a speed trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets records, "writes the" Gazzetta dello Sport. ".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for double winner FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: After a short holiday and a few days of training, Hansi Flick, who has recovered "reasonably well," already has to consider after the first team training how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury to his left foot and is in danger of missing crucial premier class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's dirty weather, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf cart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: The 24-year-old is unlikely to be able to play in the second leg against Chelsea on 8 August, but can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: The Bavarians do not want to be stopped by the mishap from the training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on the way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration should show his victory-hungry title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the premier class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the compulsory tasks with the championship and trophy simply outstandingly.
wn.de.700404.12: Now we have to create something special, "said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munich team can deal with the final tournament and before that a training camp in the Algarve, the obligation to play in the last 16 against FC Chelsea is pending.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3: 0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bayern nightmare again in the home arena as in the lost "Finale dahoam" in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and gain confidence with a good game, "demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test for the tuning-up is on Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Strasse, including the new players around high-end shopping Leroy Sané, who met all his new colleagues on the pitch for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Leroy, like all newcomers, has fitted in well," Flick said.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sané & Co. are no longer just allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small-group training, the Londoners are now training in team strength, who, unlike the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of the game.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A path to the finals in Lisbon "is not that easy," stressed the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation, what is particularly important in the 0-to-100 tuning.
wn.de.700404.26: Working with his current team is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine-team teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago and defender David Alaba, whose stay beyond the premier class season is not assured.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to crown its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to race on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Racing calendar is becoming more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula One season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten Grand Prix confirmed so far, three more racetracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, the Nürburgring in Germany and Portimo in Portugal are to be raced.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 race calendar currently includes 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased that we continue to make great progress in finalizing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: In total, 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to close its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar will be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November ahead of the already officially targeted races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents will be raced, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: The FIA will use a special rule to award the titles, citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional season start in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation meets with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil will not take place.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being with them again next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races was criticized especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in So Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The number of infections in the So Paulo region is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: The concerns of some teams about not wanting to race in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's famous latenight show via video link and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video link.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she told of her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil eye" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a well-known latenight show about her plans for the future as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to shift the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children take to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and political leaders who scoff at her on social media, or even try to silence her, find her "funny" because the reactions show her "because they have no other answer.".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview, when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she gave US President Trump an angry look.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN Climate Summit in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip turned into a GIF, an animated image that ultimately became one of the most widely used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the American president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she replied only briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think it needs any further explanation.".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not reckoned with the quick-witted answer and briefly disappeared from the picture, laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmunder Immobile with three-pack for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on a par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Boot.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmund-based Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB professional contributed three goals to Lazio Rome's 5-1 (1-1) victory at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the injury times of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old from fourth in the table now has 34 goals to his account two games before the end of the season - just as many FC Bayern Munich's Robert Lewandowski scored in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar scored against Sampdoria Genoa in the evening.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green dies
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Blues-rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Ingenious guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday. A further statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a "monumental loss" for all past and present members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgotten today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game," "In The Skies") was like a rollercoaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac, Green experienced a rapid rise - but the band celebrated its greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all of the group's profits to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to appear in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Only three years after the formation, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues-rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the streets at times, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London district of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: Already at a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar chords.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to appear on stage as the lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards, he was hired by the Bluesbreakers to replace his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 with fellow Bluesbreakers Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross," composed by Green, gave the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its dark side: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number one hit.".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green achieved a surprising success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, Fleetwood Mac swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite several small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until he started again in 1996 with a group of musician friends.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star returning to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free from drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
